data.name: Peashooter
data.description:
Peashooter is your first line of defense which shoots peas to attack zombies. 
Plant feature: green plant, pea family

data.name: Sunflower
data.description:
Sunflower is a primary plant which produces more sun for you. Plant as many of them as possible!
Sun production: Medium
Plant feature: yellow plant, infinite sun

data.name: Wall-nut
data.description: Wall-nuts have hard shells which you can use to protect your other plants.

data.name: Potato Mine
data.description: Potato Mines explode on contact, but they take time to arm. Plant them ahead of zombies.

data.name: Cabbage-pult
data.description: Cabbage-pults hurl cabbages at the enemy.

data.name: Bloomerang
data.description: Bloomerang is the first new plant the player receives in Plants vs. Zombies 2. He fires boomerang petals down his lane that can hit up to three targets twice (once when it moves forward and once when it returns.) It fires every 3 seconds.

data.name: Iceberg Lettuce
data.description: Iceberg Lettuces freeze a zombie when stepped on.

data.name: Grave Buster
data.usage: Single use, must be planted on graves
data.description: Grave Busters consume graves they're planted on.

data.name: Bonk Choy
data.description:
Bonk Choys rapidly punch nearby enemies that are ahead or behind them.
Special: can attack ahead or behind

data.name: Repeater
data.description: Repeater fires two peas at a time.

data.name: Twin Sunflower
data.description: Twin Sunflowers give twice as much sun as a normal sunflower.

data.name: Kernel-pult
data.description: Kernel-pults fling corn kernels and butter at zombies.

data.name: Snapdragon
data.special: Damages all zombies in the 6 tiles in front of it
data.description: Snapdragons breathe fire that causes damage in 6 adjacent tiles.

data.name: Spikeweed
data.description: Spikeweeds destroy one rolling zombie and hurt any zombies that step on them.

data.name: Spring Bean
data.special: Pushes zombies back, or into the water
data.description: Spring Beans bounce back zombies that get too close. Will bounce them into water if nearby.

data.name: Coconut Cannon
data.special: On impact, explodes in medium area
data.description: Coconut Cannons fire down a single lane, causing a medium explosion upon impact.

data.name: Threepeater
data.description: Threepeaters shoot peas in three lanes.

data.name: Spikerock
data.weakness: Can take three hits from rolling zombies
data.description: Spikerocks destroy multiple rolling zombies and damage zombies that walk over it.

data.name: Cherry Bomb
data.description: Cherry Bombs can blow up all zombies in an area. They have a short fuse so plant them near zombies.

data.name: Split Pea
data.description: Split Peas shoot peas forward and backwards.

data.name: Chili Bean
data.special: Eating zombie is destroyed and releases stunning gas
data.description: Chili Beans deliver a crippling bout of gastrointestinal distress.

data.name: Pea Pod
data.special: Increases rate of fire with multiple plantings
data.description: Pea Pods can be planted in the same space for up to 5 times the destruction.

data.name: Lightning Reed
data.range: Multi-hit, can even hit targets one lane above or below
data.description: Lightning Reeds shoot lightning at nearest zombie up to one lane away. The bolt will then arc and hit other zombies.

data.name: Melon-pult
data.description: Melon-pults do heavy damage to groups of zombies.

data.name: Tall-nut
data.description: Tall-nuts are heavy-duty wall plants that block low flying zombies.

data.name: Winter Melon
data.description: Winter Melons do heavy damage and chills groups of zombies.

data.name: Hot Potato
data.description: Hot Potatoes melt the ice blocks they're planted on.

data.name: Pepper-pult
data.special: Warms nearby tiles immune to frost
data.description: Pepper-pults lob flaming peppers at zombies and keeps nearby plants warm.

data.name: Chard Guard
data.description: Chard Guards are defensive blockers that can hurl zombies backwards.

data.name: Stunion
data.usage: Single use, activates when zombie is close
data.description: Stunions breathe a stunning cloud of gas on nearby zombies in the lane.

data.name: Rotobaga
data.description: Rotobagas shoot projectiles along the four diagonals, in each direction that has a target

data.name: Red Stinger
data.toughness:
300 damage per shot (columns 1-3)
900 damage per shot (columns 4-6)
1500 damage per shot (columns 7-9)
data.description: Red Stingers fire shots at full force when close to home, and become more defensive further from it.

data.name: A.K.E.E.
data.damage: 0/50/40/30 damage per shot (the first, second, third and fourth zombies)
data.description: A.K.E.E.s lob projectiles that bounce from zombie to zombie.

data.name: Endurian
data.description: Endurians are defensive plants that deal damage to zombies attacking them.

data.name: Stallia
data.usage: Single use, activates when zombie is close
data.description: Stallias slow down zombies with a puff of perfume.

data.name: Gold Leaf
data.description: Gold Leaves create a Gold Tile on planting.

data.name: Laser Bean
data.range: Multi-Hit, all zombie in a lane
data.description: Laser Beans fire down a lane, hitting all zombies ahead of it.

data.name: Blover
data.description: Blovers blow away all zombies in air

data.name: Citron
data.description: Citrons shoot powerful balls of plasma

data.name: E.M.Peach
data.description: E.M.Peaches explode and disable all machines in an area.

data.name: Infi-nut
data.description: Infi-nuts are weaker than Wall-nuts, but they regain health over time.

data.name: Magnifying Grass
data.special: Tap to spend sun for an attack
data.description: Magnifying Grass turns sun into a bolt of colorful damage.

data.name: Tile Turnip
data.description: Tile Turnips create a Power Tile on planting.
